=Installation=

==Maven users==

===Facebook test java API===
{{{
<dependency>
   <groupId>com.jayway.facebooktestjavaapi</groupId>
   <artifactId>facebook-test-java-api</artifactId>
   <version>1.1.4</version>
</dependency>
}}}

===Examples===
[https://github.com/jayway/facebook-test-java-api/tree/master/examples Examples project on Github]

==Non-Maven users==

Download [http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/jayway/facebooktestjavaapi/facebook-test-java-api/1.1.4/facebook-test-java-api-1.1.4.jar facebook-test-java-api-1.1.4.jar]. You may also need to download the [http://facebook-test-java-api.googlecode.com/files/third-party-dependencies-1.1.4.zip third-party dependencies] too.

Put all of the downloaded jars in your classpath.
